name: Kip and Odosan
description:
• A single player adventure with beautiful hand drawn worlds, unique enemies, and an all original music soundtrack.
  • Play as both Kip and Odosan, each with unique abilities along with fun variety in game play, mechanics, and power ups. Levels range from standard platforming, to run n gun, chase levels, boss fights, hard core platforming, side shooter, and staged boss battles.
  • A comic book approach to story that offers twists and turns along the way and changing mechanics.
  • Complete with collectibles, speed/timing, and death counts.
  • The controls are kept simple and the game play intuitive. Explore, learn, and master as you play! Every death, every failure, brings you closer to solving the mystery, and re-uniting Kip and Odosan at last, and maybe saving the galaxy along the way!

Supports both Keyboard and Controller player. For controller support the Generic Gamepad template is recommended. Keyboard support includes:
  • Movement: Arrow Keys, Z = Jump, V = Shoot (Z = A Button, X = B Button)
  • Movement: WASD, U = Jump, P = Shoot (U = A Button, I = B Button)
  • Escape, Space Bar to pause or exit game from Menu
